title: Emmanuel Acho | Ep 96 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Emmanuel Acho | Ep 96 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Former NFL linebacker and current Fox Sports personality, Emmanuel Acho, joins Matt and Stak on epsiode 96 of ALL THE SMOKE. Acho discusses his NFL career, NBA fandom, and his transition into media. Plus, he opens up about his controversial comments about USA track star Sha'Carri Richardson and talks social activism.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
